short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you have sweet Nest cameras, but don't subscribe to Nest Aware? Me too. I use this to remove the Nest Aware ad from view.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have awesome Nest cameras, but don't subscribe to Nest Aware?  Me too. 

The banner ad for Nest Aware on all the camera pages isn't about to get me to sign up, so I use this extension to remove it from view.
